challenge.title: RSA Challenge III: Low Encryption Exponent
challenge.author: Subhayan RoyMoulick, Dan Myshkin, Spyros Gasteratos
challenge.description:
We have a single message m, that was encrpted, using RSA, and sent to three people. All reciepents have the same RSA ecryption modulas e (e=3), (notice it also matches the no. of recipients ;) ). We are interested in the message.
Your Objective : Reveal the originial message
